page.title: 09SHOPPING - STRANRAER
page.content: Stranraer is not a very big town, and therefore hasn't got very many large shops. Three of the largest shops are the Co-op, William Low and Fine Fare. All three offer a wide variety of {foods.}George Street is the most popular street for shopping in. Stranraer has nine clothing shops the two most popular being Galls and Skirt n' Slack. They both sell women's and children's clothing. There are only a few men's clothing shops in Stranraer. For greater choice and variety of goods it is necessary to travel to{Ayr or{Glasgow. There are several shops which supply {agricultural goods}to cater for the large farming community. There are plenty of cafes and snack bars in the town, of which, the Ivy Leaf is the most popular.
